content: Many heretics, witches, and atheists were burned at the stake of the Inquisition. Today, the scientist who unwittingly declares that he believes in a supernatural intelligence will be discriminated against by his materialistic peers and persecuted in his professional career.
translations: ita:Molti eretici, streghe e atei furono bruciati sul rogo dell'Inquisizione. Oggi, lo scienziato che incautamente dichiara
